title.rendered: Official University of the Free State Prospectus 2024 – Download Now

content.rendered:
The University of the Free State consists:

  • Acronyms and definitions
  • Course and courses information
  • Campus facilities and usage
  • Accommodation, and residence application
  • Schools fees/tuitions
  • Financial support and bursaries
  • Entry requirements
  • University of the Free State admission process.

Our prospectus outlines the courses that we offer and how you can apply for admission at University of the Free State based on the information provided within it.

Note: University of the Free State’s prospectus is very useful, especially to new applicants, because it gives information about your application in greater detail.

University of the Free State Prospectus 2024

The University of the Free State   Prospectus is now available for download on the college’s official website, https://www.ufs.ac.za/.

University of the Free State PROSPECTUS 2024 – PDF DOWNLOAD

 

See also Official University of the Western Cape Prospectus 2024 – Download Now
